title: "R Notebook my awesome workflow!"
output: html_notebook
---

1. Import data procedure
```{r}
library(haven)
mining <- read_sas("http://www.principlesofeconometrics.com/sas/mining.sas7bdat", 
    NULL)


```

2. Wrangle the data
```{r}

library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

mining2 <- mining %>%
 filter(!(YEAR %in% c("1972", "1973", "1974", "1975", "1976", "1977", "1978"))) %>%
 filter(QTR %in% "4")


```

3. ggplot2 data viz
```{r}
p <- ggplot(mining2) +
 aes(x = PRO, y = POW) +
 geom_point(size = 1L, colour = "#0c4c8a") +
 theme_minimal()

p

```

4. Plotly
```{r}
library(plotly)
ggplotly(p)


```
